persistence.application: Persistence control is delegated to the application.
persistence.filesystem: State of in-flight messages is held in persistent storage and prevents loss of messages to some degree in case of a client failure.
persistence.memory: State of in-flight messages is lost in case of a client shutdown or failure. Some messages may not be delivered even with QoS 1 or higher.

qos.atLeastOnce: Messages are guaranteed to be delivered at least once by acknowledging receipt of a message.
qos.atMostOnce: Fastest method, but the delivery of a message is not guaranteed.
qos.exactlyOnce: Safest but slowest method. Message is guaranteed to be delivered exactly once utilizing a 4-part handshake.
